name: Baby Buddha
description:
Introduction

Baby Buddah Bail-out.

This one rapp wonder is a quick exit from the rainbow ridge approach for Jehova 300, Mormon Spires, and Upper Mormon. Shall the weather turn bad and you need to get to safe ground, or just want to cut the trip short, Baby Buddha will drop you down to safe ground.

Descent

r1. 220'- 150' on wall to 70' free hang. extend pull 20'. 220' will land you in the steep slick rock bowl onto a mud clump ledge. 240' will get you to flat terrain and good pull angle.

Exit

either continue down drainage to next 64' drop. (reccomended with runoff. Or scramble back up to overlook trail and brins mesa trail. Exit the way you came.

Red tape

Pay for parking pass at trailhead.

Beta sites

Trip reports and media

Background

fd: Eric Moorcroft, Tyler Arnestad, and Alex Balos. 4/2/2021

Approach

Descent

Exit

Red tape

Red Rocks pass required for parking at trailhead. $5 per day at pay station at trailhead. Annual National Park Pass will also work.
